metadata.title: CVE-2012-4384 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
letodms has multiple XSS issues: Reflected XSS in Login Page, Stored XSS inDocument Owner/User name, Stored XSS in Calendar

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4384` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

letodms - 3.3.11+dfsg-1
letodms-webdav - 3.3.11+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: letodms package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.11+dfsg-1').
